# [Hopvue](https://*.hopvue.com)

Hopvue Provider

## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: Hopvue
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: NO
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: *.hopvue.com
- Responsive response: NO
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection
